languages.text:
Мон-кай, {mf|самец|самка}. Холеное отродье из высшей касты, которое кормили и экипировали по высшему разряду. Явно совсем недавно в Темном городе, еще не успевшем оставить печать вечного ожидания гибели на е{mf|го|е} приплюснутой морде. Самая славная дичь, такая цепляется за жизнь сильнее всего, а значит, и эссенция ее смерти слаще прочих.
Рефлексы наполняют мышцы жаждой действия.

A {mf|male|female} mon-keigh. A pampered upper-caste cub who was fed and equipped with the best their race can offer. It certainly arrived in the Dark City recently, the city which has not yet managed to leave a mark of perpetual expectation of doom on its flattened snout. The most glorious game which clings to life the strongest and leaves the sweetest death essence.
The reflexes urge the muscles to act.
languages.original_text:

Самая славная дичь, такая цепляется за жизнь сильнее всего, а значит, и эссенция ее смерти слаще прочих.
Рефлексы наполняют мышцы жаждой действия.

traits.locale_text:
A {mf|male|female} mon-keigh. A pampered upper-caste cub who was fed and equipped to the best of what their race can offer. It certainly arrived to the Dark City not long ago, which has not yet managed to leave a mark of perpetual expectation of doom on its flattened snout. The most glorious game which clings to life the strongest and leaves the sweetest death essence.
The reflexes urge the muscles to act.
traits.speaker: Player

languages.text:
{mf|男|女}のモン＝ケイ。 種族が用意できる最高の食事と装備を与えられた、甘やかされた上流カーストの子。その子は確かに最近、仄暗き都、その平らな鼻先に永遠の破滅への期待の痕跡をいまだ残すことのできていない街にやってきた。最も強く生に執着し、最も甘美な死のエッセンスを残す最も輝かしいゲーム。
反射神経は筋肉を機敏に操る。
languages.original_text:
A {mf|male|female} mon-keigh. A pampered upper-caste cub who was fed and equipped with the best their race can offer. It certainly arrived in the Dark City recently, the city which has not yet managed to leave a mark of perpetual expectation of doom on its flattened snout. The most glorious game which clings to life the strongest and leaves the sweetest death essence.
The reflexes urge the muscles to act.

traits.locale_text:
{mf|男|女}のモン＝ケイ。 種族が用意できる最高の食事と装備を与えられた、甘やかされた上流カーストの子。その子は確かに最近、仄暗き都、その平らな鼻先に永遠の破滅への期待の痕跡をいまだ残すことのできていない街にやってきた。最も強く生に執着し、最も甘美な死のエッセンスを残す最も輝かしいゲーム。
反射神経は筋肉を機敏に操る。
traits.speaker: Player

languages.text:
那是个{mf|雄性|雌性}猴子，是个被宠坏的幼崽，来自上层社会。猎物的营养与装备水平均为猴子社会所能提供的最高水平。猎物肯定是最近才来到黑暗之城的，因为这座城市还没有在它的脸上留下永远的痛苦与灾厄。这一定会是最为美妙的猎物，它在临死前一定会拼命挣扎，留下最甜蜜的死亡精华。
我的反射神经已经促使我的肌肉采取行动了。
languages.original_text:
A {mf|male|female} mon-keigh. A pampered upper-caste cub who was fed and equipped with the best their race can offer. It certainly arrived in the Dark City recently, the city which has not yet managed to leave a mark of perpetual expectation of doom on its flattened snout. The most glorious game which clings to life the strongest and leaves the sweetest death essence.
The reflexes urge the muscles to act.

我的反射神经已经促使我的肌肉采取行动了。
traits.speaker: Player

languages.text:
{mf|Un macho|Una hembra} mon-keigh. {mf|Un cachorro|Una cachorra} de casta superior mimad{mf|o|a} y equipad{mf|o|a} con lo mejor que su raza puede ofrecer. No hay duda de que es un{mf||a} recién llegad{mf|o|a} a la Ciudad Siniestra, ya que aún no ha conseguido implantar la sensación de la perdición inminente en su hocico aplastado. El juego más glorioso que se aferra con más fuerza a la vida y deja la esencia más dulce de la muerte.
Los reflejos instan a los músculos a actuar.
languages.original_text:

traits.speaker: Player

languages.text:
Ein {mf|männlicher|weiblicher} Chem-Pan-Sey. Ein verwöhnter Welpe aus der oberen Kaste, mit der besten Ernährung und Ausrüstung, die seine Spezies zu bieten hat. Ganz gewiss erst kürzlich in der Dunklen Stadt eingetroffen, denn die Stadt hat seiner plattgedrückten Schnauze noch keine ständige Erwartung des Untergangs aufgedrückt, das würde man sehen. Die glorreichste Beute, die sich am stärksten ans Leben klammert und die süßeste Todesessenz hinterlässt.
Die Reflexe treiben die Muskeln an, zu handeln.

languages.text:
{mf|Un|Une} mon-keigh {mf|mâle|femelle}. Un lionceau de la caste supérieure, choyé, bien nourri, équipé de ce que sa race a de mieux à offrir. {mf|Il|Elle} a dû arriver récemment dans la Cité Crépusculaire, car on ne peut pas encore lire sur son museau écrasé la crainte de l'imminence d'une catastrophe, une expression commune parmi ceux qui arpentent ces rues. Ce qui en fait une proie de choix, de celles qui s'accrochent désespérément à la vie et dont l'essence funèbre est la plus douce.
Mes réflexes poussent mes muscles à agir.

languages.text:
{mf|Erkek|Dişi} bir mon-keigh. Irkının sağlayabileceği en iyi ürünlerle donatılmış ve beslenmiş, şımarık bir üst sınıf mensubu. Kara Şehir'e yakın zamanda geldiği kesin. Şehir, henüz ona yaklaşan hazin sonunun korkusunu aşılamamış, üzerinde izini bırakmamış. En kaliteli et, hayata en güçlü tutunan ve en lezzetli ölüm özünü bırakanların etidir.
Refleksler, kaslara eyleme geçmelerini söylüyor.
languages.original_text:

traits.locale_text:
{mf|Erkek|Dişi} bir mon-keigh. Irkının sağlayabileceği en iyi ürünlerle donatılmış ve beslenmiş, şımarık bir üst sınıf üyesi. Kara Şehir'e yakın zamanda geldiği kesin ve şehir, onun burnunu sürtüp, daimî şekilde ölümü bekler hâle henüz getirmemiş, henüz izini bırakmamış. En kaliteli et, hayata en güçlü tutunan ve en lezzetli ölüm özünü bırakanlarınkidir.
Refleksler, kaslara eyleme geçmelerini söylüyor.
traits.speaker: Player
